channel.title: NYS:SG on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in NYS:SG on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Sweetgreen Sinks on Fewer Diners Splurging for Pricey Salads
item.description: Sweetgreen Inc. slashed its sales guidance after a second straight quarter of disappointing results, highlighting the salad chain’s struggles to sell $15 salads to budget-strained diners.

item.title: Sweetgreen Sinks on Fewer Diners Splurging for Pricey Salads
item.description: Sweetgreen Inc. slashed its sales guidance after a second straight quarter of disappointing results, highlighting the salad chain’s struggles to sell $15 salads to budget-strained diners.

item.title: Sweetgreen’s Sales Doldrums Deepen, Sending Shares Plunging
item.description: Sweetgreen Inc. slashed its sales guidance after a second straight quarter of disappointing results, highlighting the salad chain’s struggles to attract budget-strained American diners.

item.title: Sweetgreen’s Sales Doldrums Deepen, Sending Shares Plunging
item.description: Sweetgreen Inc. slashed its sales guidance after a second straight quarter of disappointing results, highlighting the salad chain’s struggles to attract budget-strained American diners.
